title: How can I control my phone if I can't see the screen but the touch does work?
content:
I rinsed my Pixel 3XL with water from the tap. After 5 hrs ish, my phone got very hot and the screen went off. It has water in it because I can see the fog in the camera lens. The thing is that the touch does work, but since I see nothing, I don't see what I am tapping.

Is there a way I can activate screencasting (I have a Chromecast) using Google Assistant? I tried but I couldn't get to share the screen.

If you got any other suggestion of what can I do, I will appreciate.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3 XL
